QuestData.Title: Rodrigo's Roost
QuestData.Description:
We should check in with Cyrus and Taelia before we get in too deep.
<Flynn pens a note on a scrap of parchment and tucks it into a small courier bag.>
This is all of the evidence we've gathered so far linking the Ashvane Trading Company to the weapons and pirates here in Freehold.
Take it to Rodrigo, on the rooftop just behind this tavern. He raises parrots that make great messengers. Some are even big enough to ride!
Rodrigo's a few planks short of a poop deck, but he's trustworthy!
QuestData.CompletionText: Talk to Rodrigo and send that evidence off to Taelia.
QuestData.RewardText: Alright, now that the boss is updated, let's get back to work.
